• AGROTECH

    LIFE FARM

    In daily life farmers face difficulties with animals and birds entering their field and damaging and consuming the crops to fulfil their hunger and other needs, this leads to a conflict between animals and the farmers. Thus we are building an application to overcome this issue.

TECH SPECS

Protect Farm Animals
Save crops

ABOUT LIFE FARM COMPANY

We are building a mobile app which alerts the farmers on detection of animals and birds entering in the field and also send sound/frequency to deter the animals using sound/frequency emitting device which prevents the crops without harming the animals and birds. .

We have built a ML model to identify animals. Upon detection, a signal is sent to ESP-32, which activates the sound/frequency emitting device which disrupts the animals and birds to protects the crops
